targets.expr: count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `.*bot.*` | http_user_agent !~ `.*crawler.*` | http_user_agent != `worldping-api` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | status != `418` | __error__=`` [1h])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `.*bot.*` | http_user_agent !~ `.*crawler.*` | http_user_agent != `worldping-api` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | status != `418` | __error__=`` [24h])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `.*bot.*` | http_user_agent !~ `.*crawler.*` | http_user_agent != `worldping-api` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | status != `418` | __error__=`` [2d])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `.*bot.*` | http_user_agent !~ `.*crawler.*` | http_user_agent != `worldping-api` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | status != `418` | __error__=`` [7d])))

sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status != "418"  | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `.*bot.*` | http_user_agent !~ `.*crawler.*` | http_user_agent != `worldping-api` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | status != `418` | __error__=`` [1d])))

count(sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `.*bot.*` | http_user_agent !~ `.*crawler.*` | http_user_agent != `worldping-api` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | status != `418` | __error__=`` [1d])))

topk(5, sum by(remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ `.*bot.*` | http_user_agent !~ `.*crawler.*` | http_user_agent != `worldping-api` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | status != `418` | __error__=`` [$__interval])))

topk(10, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status != "418" | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | http_referer != "" and http_referer !~ ".*?$host.*?" | __error__="" [$__interval])))

topk(10,sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | status != "418" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | request_uri != "/" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" | __error__="" [$__interval])))

topk(5, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | status != "418" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | http_referer != "" and http_referer !~ ".*?$host.*?" | __error__="" [$__interval])))

topk(10, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | status != "418" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" |  __error__="" [$__interval])))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by(host) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"}[$__interval]))
(sum(rate({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status =~ `5\d\d` | __error__=`` [$__interval])) / 100) / sum(rate({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | __error__=`` [$__interval]))
sum(rate(({job="$job", host="$host", filename="$filename"} |= "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / (sum(rate(({job="$job", host="$host", filename="$filename"} != "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / 100)
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

{filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status != `418` | http_user_agent !~ `.*bot.*` | http_user_agent !~ `.*crawler.*` | request_uri != `/ts2021` | http_user_agent != `worldping-api` | request_uri !~ `/wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `//wp-.*` | request_uri !~ `/*.wordfence.*` | request_uri !~ `/robots.txt` | request_uri !~ `/xmlrpc.php` | line_format `request for {{.request_uri}} with HTTP status: {{.status}} from {{.remote_addr}} located {{.geoip_country_code}}`
quantile_over_time(0.95,{filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status != "418" | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]) by (host)
max by (host) (max_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status != "418" | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status != "418" |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({filename="$filename", host="$host"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
